PageDescription: Optimize the working process within your governmental institutions and public sector with ONLYOFFICE solutions.
HeroSubitle: Reliable infrastructure for document management and collaboration
OrganizeHead1: Organizujte sigurnu saradnju dokumenata sa spoljnim organizacijama
OrganizeHeading1: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace vam omogućava da kreirate prilagodljive sobe za saradnju sa fleksibilnim dozvolama za bilo koju svrhu.
OrganizeFeature1: Obezbedite različite dozvole za pristup: pregledanje, uređivanje, komentarisanje, recenziranje, popunjavanje obrazaca itd. Podelite dokumente putem spoljašnjih linkova kako biste omogućili pregled bez registracije.
OrganizeFeature12: Radite sa bilo kojim sadržajem: tekstualnim dokumentima, tabelama, prezentacijama, digitalnim oblicima, PDF datotekama, e-knjigama itd.
OrganizeFeature13: Komunicirajte u realnom vremenu putem ćaskanja, organizujte audio i video pozive.
OrganizeFeature14: Zaštitite sobe i osetljive datoteke koje mogu sadržati koristeći više bezbednosnih podešavanja.
OrganizeFeature15: Prijavite se na daljinu sa bilo koje lokacije, bilo kog pretraživača i bilo kog uređaja.
OrganizeHeading2: ONLYOFFICE Workspace offers a set of tools to organize every process within your organization
OrganizeFeature2: Store, manage, and collaborate on documents online.
OrganizeFeature22: Create professional-looking forms and let other users fill them in.
OrganizeFeature25: Manage information and improve team communication.
OrganizeFeature26: Prijavite se na daljinu sa bilo koje lokacije, bilo kog pretraživača i bilo kog uređaja.
HopewellHead: Read how Hopewell, Virginia adopted ONLYOFFICE to enable remote work for 500 government employees
HopewellText: “Within ONLYOFFICE, employees can now share files and ideas, edit files in real time and chat with others in their departments or across the organization. ONLYOFFICE has quickly changed our employees’ perception to the new reality.”
PlatformTitle: Enable real-time co-editing within your platform
PlatformSubtitle: ONLYOFFICE Docs easily integrates with government infrastructure. Providing <0>ready-to-use connectors</0> for popular cloud services, it allows you to use powerful online document editors within your existing platform.
SpdHead: Read how SPD Bad Säckingen organized effective cooperation within a political association.
SpdText: “With ONLYOFFICE, we are now able to prepare ourselves perfectly and work together outside of meetings, that was not possible before.”
SpdAuthorInfo: Acting Chairman at SPD Bad Säckingen
FeaturesToolsHeading: 3 reasons to use ONLYOFFICE within your organization
FeatureToolsText1: ONLYOFFICE can be deployed on-premises as a private or hybrid cloud solution, so your documents always stay within your infrastructure: no hand-off to public clouds.
FeatureToolsText2: ONLYOFFICE affirms its transparency and reliability by opening the source code of all functional modules and tools.
FeatureToolsText3: ONLYOFFICE uses the industry-leading AES-256 encryption standard to protect your sensitive data at rest. Data is protected in transit by use of HTTPS protocols with up-to-date TLS encryption algorithm.
FeatureToolsText4: Flexible access rights and JWT let you entirely control document access. Activity tracking and audit reporting provide traceability.
FeatureToolsText5: In ONLYOFFICE, all personal information is treated carefully. Our data security policy is fully compliant with the GDPR standards.
FeaturesToolsText: ONLYOFFICE has a familiar and self-explanatory user interface that allows employees to start using the new system painlessly and quickly without a sharp learning curve.
FeaturesToolsTitle: ONLYOFFICE provides a pre-configured and optimized enterprise version:
PriorityAccessToSecurity: priority access to security and stability fixes
FreeTrialLifetimeLicense: free trial, lifetime license + yearly updates and support
AppsSubtitle: ONLYOFFICE offers free desktop apps for Windows, Linux, and Mac OS to work seamlessly with Word, Excel, and PowerPoint file types. Employees can easily connect to the cloud (ONLYOFFICE, Nextcloud, ownCloud, Seafile, Liferay, or kDrive) to share and collaborate on important documents in real time. Free mobile apps for iOS and Android are also available.
